# CSS Toolkit Layout

Layout classes for changing the default document flow.

## Available Classes

* `clearfix` - Contain floats (micro clearfix).
* `float-left` - Float left.
* `float-right` - Float right.
* `inline` - Display `inline`.
* `block` - Display `block`.
* `inline-block` - Display `inline-block`.
